A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi answers all mysteries brought by The Force Awakens in the most boring/anti-climatic way that leaves us with no expectation for the next episode.
Scenes that would be epic are ruined by jokes that throws the audience out of the movie and prevents us from caring for the characters.
The whole movie is about one slow never-ending battle that will put you to sleep.
Good luck to J.J. Abrams to save the franchise from this terrible movie.
